#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	long long int a,b,a0,a1;
	cin>>a;
	cin>>b;
	while(a!=0&&b!=0){
		long long int count=0;
		a0=1;
		a1=2;
		for(;a0<=b;){
			if(a0>=a){
				count++;
			}
			a0=a0+a1;
			a1=a1+a0;
			a0=a1-a0;
			a1=a1-a0;
		}
		cout<<count<<'\n';
		cin>>a;
		cin>>b;
	}
	return 0;
}
